alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Howard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:43PM CDT until June 04 at 5:17AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at Boonville affecting Cooper and Howard Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River at Boonville. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low-lying rural areas along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:04 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 8.9 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Fri Sat 1am 1pm 1am Missouri River Boonville 21.0 21.7 Thu 8pm 21.5 19.6 16.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
